typeDescriptions.typeString: struct IXyRequester.IPFSRequest storage ref[] storage ref

devdoc.details: Will escrow funds until an item is marked as delivered .

requestPayOnDelivery(bytes32,uint256,uin.details: Called by PonD client.  API for client to request an intersection question

params.beneficiary: The destination address of the funds.
params.requestId: - the hash of the request (first 2 bytes stripped)
params.weiPayOnDelivery: - the amount of eth to pay on delivery
params.xyoBounty: - the xyo bounty for the request (approve scsc for this amount)
params.xyoPayOnDelivery: - the amount of XYO to pay on delivery

submitResponse(bytes32,uint8,bytes).details: Called by SCSC. If intersection, transfer pay on delivery to beneficiary, delete request

params.requestId: - the hash of the request (first 2 bytes stripped)

devdoc.title: A Payment on delivery contract
